TEXT: At the start of each combat, card values are randomized between #b50% (rounded up) and #b200% of their base values.

This card is performed X times.

[3][4] is a special case for Purity and Omniscience

TEXT: Reduces each of your debuffs by #b1.
EXTRA_TEXT: NL Reduce each of your debuffs by %d.

NL Gain %d Focus. NL At the end of this turn, lose %d Focus.

#yEthereal. NL When #yExhausted due to #yethereal, trigger all effects.

NL When exhausted, gain [E] next turn.

TEXT: Increases cost by #b1. NL Reduces cost of drawn cards by #b1.

NL Exhaust %d random Status or Curse cards you own.
NL Plays twice. NL Gain %d Frail.
